give.bot_1: Villager Bot already has a full inventory (About 100000000000000000 unique items!)
give.bot_2: You can't give stuff bots as they don't have rights and can't have emeralds or stuff.

give.stupid_3: You can't give someone more emeralds than you have.
give.stupid_4: You can't give an item you don't even have.
give.stupid_5: You can't give more of an item than you have.

gamble.stupid_2: You have to gamble 10 or more emeralds at a time.
